response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits tailored to enhance your experience. We understand its significance to you, given its worth of $1,200,000 to you personally.

To make this acquisition possible, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for discerning buyers like yourself.

Please consider this offer carefully, knowing that it reflects our commitment to providing unparalleled value to our esteemed clientele. If you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we will arrange for the smooth transaction and delivery of the product to your preferred location.

Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details of this offer, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of serving you and contributing to your satisfaction with our product.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
